items.name: Mara Serene Eco-Camp
items.short_description: A luxurious, solar-powered tented camp offering unparalleled wildlife viewing with minimal environmental impact. Experience wilderness comfort redefined in a newly opened, sustainable setting.

items.name: Enkereri Maasai Cultural Village
items.short_description: An authentic, interactive Maasai village experience offering insights into their rich traditions, dances, and daily life. This newly established village directly supports local communities through sustainable tourism.
items.address: Near Sekenani Gate, Maasai Mara National Reserve

items.name: Talek River Skydeck
items.short_description: An elevated, panoramic viewing platform offering incredible, undisturbed views of the Talek River and its resident wildlife, especially during migration season. Opened recently to enhance visitor experience.
items.address: Along Talek River, Maasai Mara National Reserve

items.name: Mara Guardians Conservation Hub
items.short_description: An interactive center dedicated to Maasai Mara's wildlife conservation, offering engaging exhibits, educational programs for all ages, and insights into anti-poaching efforts since its recent opening.
items.address: Near Mara Triangle entrance, Maasai Mara

items.name: Mara Sky Safaris Launchpad
items.short_description: A new, state-of-the-art launch and landing site for hot air balloon safaris, complete with a pre-flight briefing lounge and post-flight champagne breakfast area, offering premium aerial experiences.

items.name: Lens of the Mara Photo Camp
items.short_description: A purpose-built, mobile safari camp designed for amateur and professional photographers, offering expert-guided wildlife photography workshops and prime viewing locations since its recent inception.

items.name: Celestial Mara Observatory
items.short_description: An innovative, open-air observatory with high-powered telescopes, offering guided stargazing sessions under the pristine, unpolluted night skies of Maasai Mara, launched to capture celestial wonders.

items.name: Young Explorers Ranger Base
items.short_description: A dedicated facility offering immersive, hands-on educational programs for children and teenagers to learn about wildlife tracking, conservation, and bush skills, recently opened to inspire young minds.
items.address: Talek Gate area, Maasai Mara National Reserve

items.name: Black Rhino Conservation Outlook
items.short_description: A specially designated, secure viewing point within a newly established rhino sanctuary, offering rare and ethical opportunities to observe critically endangered black rhinos, supporting vital conservation efforts.

items.name: Mara Footprints Camp
items.short_description: A secluded, eco-conscious base camp dedicated to immersive walking safaris, allowing guests to explore the bush on foot with experienced Maasai guides and trackers. This camp recently opened to offer a deeper connection to nature.
items.address: Loita Hills region, adjacent to Maasai Mara
